post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
I present to you heed modification RtCW supports subtitles.

Video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ka9dCe3dx6I

Modification adds support for subtitles
Only Windows
The archive also contains an example subtitle file for map cutscene1

Download here RtCW with support subtitles

post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
Archive is updated, the changes:
1. Removed a bug with shooting under water from Tesla;
2. Removed a bug with shooting from the flamethrower in a mode noclip.

post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
Archive is updated, the changes:
1. Added ability to disable\enable subtitles.
2. Slightly increased time displaying subtitles

post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
Archive is updated, the changes:
1. Fixed some defects;
2. Changed version of the file of saved games to 19.

post.author: Eugeny
post.body: Returned the help screen is displayed with the command "help" from the console
